title: Mutton Saagwala
procedure: Blanch the spinach in boiling water, then puree it.
Heat oil in a pan and saut√© onions till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and cook till the raw smell disappears.
Add lamb shanks and sear on high heat.
Mix in turmeric, red chili powder, coriander powder, and cumin powder.
Add the spinach puree and cook for 20 minutes.
Pour in milk and simmer till the gravy thickens.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot with naan or rice.
